sect2.title: Installation of the kernel patch
sect2.para: Install the kernel patch by running the following commands from the kernel source directory:
In the kernel configuration, check your setting with those listed here:
sect2.screen: Block devices Packet writing on CD/DVD media: Y or M File Systems UDF filesystems support (read only): Y UDF write support (DANGEROUS) Y
sect2.para: If necessary, recompile the kernel with make CC=/opt/gcc-2.95.3/bin/gcc dep && make CC=/opt/gcc-2.95.3/bin/gcc bzImage && make CC=/opt/gcc-2.95.3/bin/gcc modules && make CC=/opt/gcc-2.95.3/bin/gcc modules_install
Copy /usr/src/linux/arch/i386/boot/bzImage and /usr/src/linux/System.map to /boot. If you utilize LILO edit /etc/lilo.conf appropriately and run lilo.
If you build packet writer as a module, add the following to /etc/modules.conf: alias block-major-97 pktcdvd
